Verses: 1 adhanpinbu Ammon Puththirarin Raajaa Mariththupponaan; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Aanoon Avan Pattaththirku Raajaavaanaan.

2 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu: Aanoonin Thagappanaagiya Naagaas Enakku Dhayavuseydhadhupola, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Ivanukku Naan Dhayaiseyven Endru Solli, Avan Thagappanukkaaga Avanukku Aarudhal Solla, Than Oozhiyakkaararai Anuppinaan; Dhaaveedhin Oozhiyakkaarar Ammon Puththirarin Dhesaththile Vandhapodhu,

3 ammon Puththirarin Prabukkal Thangal Aandavanaagiya Aanoonaip Paarththu: Dhaaveedhu Aarudhal Sollugiravargalai Ummidaththil Anuppinadhu, Ummudaiya Thagappanai Ganampannugiradhaai Umakkuth Thondrugiradho? Indhap Pattanaththai Aaraaindhu, Ulavupaarththu, Adhaik Kavizhththuppoda Allavo Dhaaveedhu Than Oozhiyakkaararai Ummidaththirku Anuppinaan Endraargal.

4 appozhudhu Aanoon: Dhaaveedhin Oozhiyakkaararaip Pidiththu, Avargaludaiya Orupakkaththuth Thaadiyai Siraiththu, Avargaludaiya Vasthirangalai Iruppidamattum Vaiththuvittu, Matrappaadhiyaik Kaththariththuppottu, Avargalai Anuppivittaan.

5 adhu Dhaaveedhukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Raajaa, Andha Manushar Migavum Vetkappattapadiyinaal, Avargalukku Edhiraaga Aatkalai Anuppi, Ungal Thaadi Valarumattum Neengal Erigovilirundhu, Pirpaadu Vaarungal Endru Solla Sonnaan.

6 ammon Puththirar Thaangal Dhaaveedhukku Aruvaruppaanadhaik Kandapodhu, Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi, Pedhrekob Dhesaththu Seeriyarilum, Sobaavilirukkira Seeriyarilum Irubadhinaayiram Kaalaatkalaiyum, Maakkaadhesaththu Raajaavinidaththil Aayiramperaiyum, Ishdhopilirukkira Panneeraayiramperaiyum, Koolippadaiyaaga Azhaippiththaargal.
7 adhai Dhaaveedhu Kelvippattapodhu, Yovaabaiyum Paraakkiramasaaligalaagiya, Samastha Raanuvaththaiyum Anuppinaan.

8 ammon Puththirar Purappattu, Olimugavaasalandaiyile Porseyya Anivaguththu Nindraargal; Aanaalum Sobaavilum Rekobilumirundhuvandha Seeriyarum, Ishdhopilum, Maakkaavilumirundhu Vandha Manusharum, Veliyile Praththiyegamaayirundhaargal.

9 yovaabo Raanuvangalin Padaimugam Thanakku Munnum Pinnum Irukkiradhaik Kaangaiyil, Avan Isravelile Therindhukollappatta Ellaa Raanuvangalilum Oru Pangaip Piriththeduththu, Adhai Seeriyarukku Edhiraaga Anivaguththu Niruththi,
10 matra Janaththai Ammon Puththirarukku Edhiraaga Anivaguththu Niruththumpadi Than Sagodharanaagiya Abisaayinidaththil Oppuviththu:
11 seeriyar Kaiminjugiradhaayirundhaal Nee Enakku Udhaviseyyavendum; Ammon Puththirar Kaiminjugiradhaayirundhaal Naan Unakku Udhaviseyya Varuven.
12 dhairiyamaayiru; Nammudaiya Janaththirkaagavum, Nammudaiya Dhevanudaiya Pattanangalukkaagavum Savuriyaththaik Kaattuvom; Karththar Thamadhu Paarvaikku Nalamaanadhai Seyvaaraaga Endraan.
13 yovaabum Avanodirundha Janamum Seeriyarmel Yuththampannak Kittinaargal; Avargal Avanukku Munbaaga Murindhodinaargal.

14 seeriyar Murindhodugiradhai Ammon Puththirar Kandapodhu, Avargalum Abisaayikku Munbaaga Murindhodip Pattanaththirkul Pugundhaargal; Appozhudhu Yovaab Ammon Puththiraraivittuth Thirumbi Erusalemukku Vandhaan.
15 thaangal Isravelukku Munbaaga Muriya Adikkappattadhai Seeriyar Kandapodhu, Orumikkak Koodinaargal.
16 aadhaaresar Nadhikku Appaalirundha Seeriyaraiyum Azhaiththanuppinaan; Avargal Elaamukku Vandhaargal; Aadhaaresarudaiya Padaiththalaivanaagiya Sobaak Avargalukku Munnaale Sendraan.

17 adhu Dhaaveedhukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Avan Isravelaiyellaam Koottikkondu, Yordhaanaik Kadandhu, Elaamukkup Ponaan; Seeriyar Dhaaveedhukku Edhiraaga Raanuvangalai Anivaguththu Nindraargal; Avanodu Yuththampannugirapodhu,

18 seeriyar Isravelukku Munbaaga Murindhodinaargal; Dhaaveedhu Seeriyaril Ezhunooru Radhaveeraraiyum Naarpadhinaayiram Kudhiraiveeraraiyum Kondru, Avargaludaiya Padaiththalaivanaagiya Sobaagaiyum Saagumpadi Vettippottaan.

19 appozhudhu Aadhaaresarai Sevikkira Sagala Raajaakkalum Thaangal Isravelukku Munbaaga Muriya Adikkappattadhaik Kandu, Isravelarode Samaadhaanampanni, Avargalai Seviththaargal. Appuram Ammon Puththirarukku Udhaviseyya Seeriyar Bayappattaargal.
